link.title: Meigs Primary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

div.p:
Meigs Local School District will be closed from March 16th 2020 through May 1st 2020(per updated mandate from Governor Dewine). Please see the following links for up to date information.
MLSD CORONAVIRUS UPDATES(Last update: 4/2/2020)
MLSD LEARNING RESOURCES(including blizzard bags)(Last update: 4/1/2020)
MLSD FOOD SERVICE DELIVERY INFORMATION(Last update: 3/24/2020)
FREE WIFI ACCESS AVAILABLE!

span.p:
Meigs Local School District will be closed from March 16th 2020 through May 1st 2020(per updated mandate from Governor Dewine). Please see the following links for up to date information.
MLSD CORONAVIRUS UPDATES(Last update: 4/2/2020)
MLSD LEARNING RESOURCES(including blizzard bags)(Last update: 4/1/2020)
MLSD FOOD SERVICE DELIVERY INFORMATION(Last update: 3/24/2020)
FREE WIFI ACCESS AVAILABLE!

Meigs Local School District is committed to providing resources that foster the continuation of learning. Please follow the "read more" link below to access resources you may use with your child at home during this extended break from in school learning.

a.title: Click to read more about: MLSD at Home Learning Resources

img.style: width: 150px; height: 81px; border-width: 1px; border-style: solid; margin: 5px; float: left;
img.br: Meigs Local Food Service, in coordination with Meigs Local Transportation will begin food deliveries to ALL student homes in MLSD starting March 24th. For more information click the link below.

a.title: Click to read more about: MLSD Meal Delivery Information

img.style: width: 150px; height: 121px; float: left; margin-left: 5px; margin-right: 5px;
img.br: Please follow this link for current Coronavirus information with regard to Meigs Local School District.

a.title: Click to read more about: MLSD Coronavirus Information and News(Updated)

span.p: Meigs Local School District is making free wifi available at the High School and the Intermediate School. Check this article out for details.

a.title: Click to read more about: PUBLIC WIFI ACCESS AVAILABLE
Click to read more about: 2019-2020 SCHOOL CALENDAR (updated 1-8-2020)

div.p: It is the mission of the Meigs Local School District, in partnership with the community, to advance the physical, intellectual and emotional development of all students in order to meet the social needs in an ever-changing world

We envision an educational environment where students, parents, teachers, and community members encourage exploration, creativity, innovation and change with sufficient resources necessary to meet the needs of all students and help them become productive members of society.

div.div: © 2020 Meigs Local Schools. All Rights Reserved
